he is having the same problem as i am: i restrore grub and then it wont load windows
then after you restore grub add windows back to /boot/grub/menu.lst
edit it with a text editor.  use something like gedit or nano.  but be VERY CAREFUL if you're not comfortable with it, else you will lose grub and have to restore it again.
also, as erUSUL would tell you, if you have windows listed on the boot menu, your problem is most likely not in menu.lst.
editing menu.lst will only help if it's not listed there
